1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from a freed slave of 'Aishah that:'Aishah said: "I never looked at (or I never saw) the private part of the Messenger of Allah." (Da'if)(One of the narrators) Abu Bakr (Ibn Abu Shaibah) said: "Abu Nu'aim would say: '(From) a freed female slave of 'Aishah

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ أَنْ يَرَى عَوْرَةَ أَخِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of seeing one’s brother’s private areas
